org.dotplot.tokenizer.filter
Class KeyWordFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.tokenizer.filter.KeyWordFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<ITokenFilter>, ITokenFilter, ITokenStream
public class KeyWordFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITokenFilter

A filter for keywords. Depending of the configuration, all Token or only keywords pass the filter.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Christian Gerhardt

Field Summary

          All Token are able to pass the filter.

KeyWordFilter

public KeyWordFilter()
Creates a KeyWordFilter. It starts in the default mode - All Token are able to pass the filter.

filterToken

public Token filterToken(Token token)
                  throws TokenizerException
Filters the Token.

Depending of the configuration, the keywords wil be allowed to pass or will be filtered The Token which will pass at any time are: EOS, EOF, EOL, Line.

Specified by:
filterToken in interface ITokenFilter
Parameters:
token - - theToken which should be filtered
Returns:
- the Token
Throws:
TokenizerException
